short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmark your favorite WordPress Photo Directory authors and photos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bookmark your favorite WordPress Photo Directory authors and photos. Uses your browser's localStorage functionality to save data, so nothing is sent back to the extension author :)

Also, photo attribution copy is now added to each photo to quickly and easily provide photo credit.
